entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
